name: SimPlay
description: A web app that generates a Spotify playlist of songs with similar lyrics and audio features to an input song

name: Connect Four AI
description: An AI and GUI for the classic Connect Four game

name: Fallen Flame
description: A survival-adventure game that I helped design and code

name: Critterworld
description: A networked Java service and GUI that simulates evolution. Created a custom language and interpreter for species rules with a fault injector to show mutations.

name: Color Memory Game
description: A colorful memory game built on the FDRM-K64F board with a user interface embedded through LED signals

name: Turtle Fractals
description: Generates fractals of customizable depth, color, angles, etc.

name: Space Invaders
description: Re-creation of the classic Space Invaders game

name: Brella
description: Sends users a text if it is going to rain tomorrow
